abstract: Intel is hiring Venables Bell & Partners in San Francisco as its lead global creative agency, replacing McCann Erickson Worldwide.
snippet: Intel is hiring Venables Bell & Partners in San Francisco as its lead global creative agency, replacing McCann Erickson Worldwide.
lead_paragraph: Intel is shifting an important advertising assignment  to create brand and corporate image campaigns  to a smaller, independent agency from a Madison Avenue giant.

headline.main: Intel Shifts Image Advertising to a Smaller Agency
headline.print_headline: Intel Shifts Image Advertising to a Smaller Agency
